data.description: interface to emulate MySQL sequences via DBI
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Emulates sequences in MySQL in a way similar to DBIx::Sequence, but
    uses MySQL specific SQL to implement them without having to do
    locking. Faster, safer, and the database is less likely to be left
    in a bad state on error.
